name: Gambit Mobile
tag_list: mobile, business, wireless, marketing, mobile-phone, telcom, sales-growth, new-markets
overview:
Gambit Mobile Inc promotes companies who are looking to set up or expand business in different markets through its unique combination of direct & channel sales strategies designed to accelerate the growth of your business.

Gambit Mobile Inc leverages its unique regional experience to help companies accelerate their business by providing three types of unique business services:

Market Estimation: empowers companies to accurately measure local customer expectations and refine their business strategy road map for a specific region.

Market Penetration: is geared to either improving established sales estimates in current markets and regions, or accessing new regions and introducing your business to completely new markets.

Technology Scouting: takes aim at technology users, such as marketing institutions, interested in the current trends within specified technological areas within the mobile ecosystem.
